Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class TestFromClientSide5

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.FromClientSideBase
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestFromClientSide5
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestFromClientSideWithCoprocessor5
public class TestFromClientSide5 extends FromClientSideBase
Run tests that use the HBase clients; Table. Sets up the HBase mini cluster once at start and runs through all client tests. Each creates a table named for the method and does its stuff against that. Parameterized to run with different registry implementations.

    • createTableAndValidateTableSchemaModification

      private void createTableAndValidateTableSchemaModification(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName tableName, boolean modifyTable) throws Exception
      Create table and validate online schema modification
      Parameters:
      tableName - Table name
      modifyTable - Modify table if true otherwise delete column family
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of failures
